name: ZRecipeRandomizer2
title: Vill's Recipe Randomizer (2.x)
author: AbuDhabi
description:
Credit goes to Villfuk02 for the version that works on 1.x.

Currently only compatible with the base game.

Randomizes all recipe ingredients to make every game feel different!
Fully configurable, theoretically works with all mods, checks dependencies, keeps recipes fair!
